text: Finding Nemo is an action-adventure video game. The game was released for the Game Boy Advance, PlayStation 2, Xbox, and Nintendo GameCube video game consoles. The game was also released for the Macintosh, Mobile phone, and for Microsoft Windows. GameSpot gave the game a 6.2 for the Xbox, PS2 and GameCube and IGN gave the game a 6.0 for the Xbox, PS2 and GameCube. The game is based on the 2013 movie Finding Nemo. There was also a sequel for the Nintendo DS called, Finding Nemo: Escape to the Big Blue that was released on February 9, 2006. ==Other websites== *Finding Nemo at MobyGames Category:2003 video games Category:Finding Nemo Category:THQ games Category:Vicarious Visions games Category:Yuke's games Category:Game Boy Advance games Category:Nintendo GameCube games Category:MacOS games Category:Mobile games Category:PlayStation 2 games Category:Video games about fish Category:Video games based on movies Category:Video games developed in the United States Category:Windows games Category:Xbox games
title: Finding Nemo (video game)
